import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import "./Admin.css" import AdminNav from '../Components/AdminNav' import { Link, Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' function Admin() { const [theme, setTheme] = useState('dark'); const toggleTheme = () => { setTheme((prevTheme) => (prevTheme === 'light' ? 'dark' : 'light')); }; function getDetails(val) { console.log(val, "data"); setId(val.id); // Set the ID in the state (used for updating) setName(val.name); // Populate the name field setNumber(val.number); // Populate the number field setEmail(val.email); // Populate the email field setPwd(val.pwd); // Populate the password field } return ( <>

) } export default Admin
